issues.economy: The Labour government saved the country from the recession, now the Tories risk everything with savage cuts.
issues.health: Labour reduced NHS waiting times, improved cancer and heart services and employs more doctors and nurses than ever.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jim Fitzpatrick - Strength, Experience and Honesty for Poplar and Limehouse
leaflet.additionalNotes: Tory plans threaten our communities. The Tory coalition promises 25% cuts in public spending. Labour reduced NHS waiting times.
